title: Why teachers need unions
author: VD
content_html:
Charles Stross points us to an English teacher’s review of Dickens, among others:

“I found this book difficult to follow and hard to hold my interest. I am an English teacher so I don’t think it’s me. I was revved about the book and started it immediately unpon receipt. I didn’t even finish it–which is something I can say about few books…”

Cthulhu wept.
content_text:

an English teacher’s review of Dickens

Cthulhu wept.
